message.name: ERR_VALIDATEWRITEOFFINSTRUCTION_FV_INVALID_AMOUNT
message.locale: Attempting to write-off a negative amount.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEWRITEOFFINSTRUCTION_XRV_INVALID_AMOUNT
message.locale: Attempting to write-off an amount greater than the unprocessed amount.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEWRITEOFFINSTRUCTION_XFV_INVALID_WRITEOFF
message.locale: Attempting to write-off a reversed or partially allocated entry.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATEWRITEOFFINSTRUCTION_FV_INCORRECT_AMOUNT
message.locale: The amount entered for write-off is incorrect. The amount entered must be greater than zero and less than, or equal to, the outstanding amount on the liability (i.e. %1n).
